question.text: According to Darwin, which of the following variations enable the individual to reproduce and leave more progeny?

options.text: The organism that are more adoptable to use the resource

Both <math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

solution.text: Fitness is the end result of the ability to adapt and get selected by nature. In an organism, the so-called fitness depends upon the inherited characteristics, so there must be a genetic basis for getting selected and to evolve. Some organisms in a population are better adapted to survive in an hostile environment.
